metadata.description:
This is an NFT that, upon purchase, wards off bad vibes, and is a limited commercial IP use agreement, to stream and monetize the song and video, so long as you own this asset in your wallet, and are not doing so in a manor that may be deemed defamatory or destructive. 

‚ÄòNO BAD VIBES‚Äô is a freestyle, recorded in one take‚Ä¶ I was going through an artistic phase of impostor syndrome with little to no support, and decided to resign myself to instrumental tracks, for inspiration in creating. I found a very simple backbeat that I found to be quite soothing and listened to it over, and over, instilling the feeling of this melody within myself, though no words accompanied the feelings.

I got an itch and decided to plug in some  earphones, and the audio featured is the result.

I was nervous to share this creation with anyone for a while, and so I just put it away, until I created the abstract self portrait (the video) you see here. I knew this portrait was a perfect embodiment of my artistic prowess and self image through abstract fluid art and geometric shapes‚Ä¶ but something was missing.

This audiovisual abstract representation of self, is the final product.
